channel.title: How i can help you!
channel.description:
I own a web hosting company with many features. I can host and register any domain name that you want. Heres the site Go check it out for more information on hosting. Its under the home tab then services. *
Im offering a 7Day free trail for the first 5 requests for a domain or web hosting...
This is not like the rest of the web hosting company's out there, theres no bandwidth limit or anything like that. and i will confirm that wafcjr is the owner of the company and site. just shoot me a email off the site for me to confirm it. :)
Hope you like it :)
Thanks.

this is not allowed, you first must get permission to post this from a global mod+

item.title: How i can help you!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“lukenuke75, post:3, topic:308613”]yes and guys quit posting this stuff on mopar this is for RS2 stuff go to www.moparisthebest.com for programing and programs[/quote]No member from moparscape is going to look on mitb for webhosting. Threads like these are acceptable if they are of terms with the staffs requirements.

Here’s an example of a legitimate webhosting advert approved by staff:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

[quote=“wafcjr, post:4, topic:308613”]Well im sorry i cant meat your standards on quality, but im just starting this company and want to kick it off with one of my kids favorite games.

BTW srry for the wrong section.[/quote]To expect respect, you must give respect. All of what I have said pertains to moparscape rules. If you wish to further your development, pend a request with a member of moparscape staff.

Read full topic
